entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Fog patches early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
